hanzi-su-wiki:
愉

Значения

Радоваться; радостный

Мнемоника

Радость на сердце 忄, как от невозможного, ставшего возможным — перехода реки, даже не замочив ног. Понтон делался из лодок борт к борту и от берега до берега. Сейчас лодка пишется, как мясо 月, а вода — как нож 刂. Треугольник вверху означает единство.

rtega_mnemonic:

purpleculture_examples:
愉快 [ yú kuài ]: cheerful; cheerily; delightful; pleasant; pleasantly; pleasing; happy; delighted
愉悦 [ yú yuè ]: joyful; cheerful; delighted; joy; delight
欢愉 [ huān yú ]: happy; joyous; delighted
恬愉 [ tián yú ]: content and at ease
恬愉之安 [ tián yú zhī ān ]: comfortably at peace (idiom)

heisig_chinese_memo: At the meeting of butchers, in their narrow state of mind, they throw lame jokes around like, 'Oh hello, I'm overjoyed to meat you', and find this rather pleasing.
heisig_constituent: pleasure, Freud, state of mind, meeting, umbrella, butchers, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, sword, sabre, saber
koohiiStory1: At the meeting of butchers, in their narrow state of mind, they throw lame jokes around like, ´Oh hello, it´s a pleasure to meat you´, and find this rather pleasing.
koohiiStory2: Image : Data attending a meeting of the butchers union. As a joke to begin his speech he says, ´Its a pleasure to MEAT you all.´ (thanx to Shibo & nestOr).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The soul of the Death Star is actually quite pleasant. And if you think about it, it's the people who control the Death Star that are evil and kill.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the Death Star in your mind. As you picture it, its pleasant, smiling soul floats up and out of it. "Oh hello, dear," it says happily, "Didn't see you there!"
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The pleasant soul within the Death Star actually looks like a yurt (ゆ), not a big angry, metal ball.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Yurts are very pleasant structures. They're round and soft and moveable, just like the Death Star's soul.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: in general (俞) your heart (忄) brings pleasure
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At the meeting of butchers, in their narrow state of mind, they throw lame jokes around like, 'Oh hello, I'm overjoyed to meat you', and find this rather pleasing.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " heart " and " Yu ", the original meaning is happiness and joy. Jin Wen once wrote " Yu " and " heart ", meaning " steal ". "Shuowen": "Bo Ye. From the heart, Yu Sheng. The Analects of Confucius said: Private confession, pleasure and joy like also." Duan Yucai's note: "This Bo is also regarded as Bo Le Ye, transcribed with the word Duo Le. Superficial pleasure." Pre-Qin documents use the original meaning, such as "Lu Shi Chunqiu·Forbidden Fortress": "The karma of the Three Emperors and Five Emperors is called the karma of the three emperors and five emperors, and it is for pleasure." Du Fu (Xiwanzhou): "Ji Li is temporarily happy, but the old man is melancholy."

" Yu " also means gentleness. "Zihui·Heart": "Yes, color and pleasing appearance." Documents also use this meaning, such as "Book of Rites·Sacrificial Righteousness": "If it enters, respect it with pleasure." Zheng Xuan noted : "Disappearance, color and appearance." Another example is "Huainanzi · Benjing": "Its heart is pleasant and not fake." Gao You's note: "Discovery, harmony."

" Pleasure " also means to persuade, that is, to persuade the heart. "Erya·Study on the Interpretation": "Pleasure and service." Guo Pu's note: "Be happy and obey."

" Discovery " in ancient texts can also pass as " Yu ", " encyclical ", " Yu ", " steal " words, almost associated with the shape.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " heart " and " Yu ", the original meaning is happiness and joy.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「俞」聲，本義為快樂、喜悅。金文曾作上「俞」下「心」，表示「偷」。《說文》：「薄也。从心，俞聲。《論語》曰：私覿愉愉如也。」段玉裁注：「此薄也當作薄樂也，轉寫奪樂字。謂淺薄之樂也。」先秦文獻用本義，如《呂氏春秋·禁塞》：「上稱三皇五帝之業，以愉其意。」高誘注：「愉，悅。」唐詩也用本義，如杜甫〈次晚州〉：「羈離暫愉悅，羸老反惆悵。」

　　「愉」也表示溫和，《字彙·心部》：「愉，顏色和悅貌。」文獻亦多用此義，如《禮記·祭義》：「其進之也，敬以愉。」鄭玄注：「愉，顏色和貌也。」又如《淮南子·本經》：「其心愉而不偽。」高誘注：「愉，和也。」

　　「愉」還表示悅服，即心悅誠服。《爾雅·釋詁上》：「愉，服也。」郭璞注：「謂喜而服從。」

　　「愉」在古代文獻中還可通為「俞」、「諭」、「歈」、「偷」等字，概與形似相關。
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「俞」聲，本義為快樂、喜悅。

愉快(ゆかい): pleasant, happy

從「 心 」，「 俞 」聲，本義為快樂、喜悅。金文曾作上「 俞 」下「 心 」，表示「 偷 」。《說文》：「薄也。从心，俞聲。《論語》曰：私覿愉愉如也。」段玉裁注：「此薄也當作薄樂也，轉寫奪樂字。謂淺薄之樂也。」先秦文獻用本義，如《呂氏春秋·禁塞》：「上稱三皇五帝之業，以愉其意。」高誘注：「愉，悅。」唐詩也用本義，如杜甫〈次晚州〉：「羈離暫愉悅，羸老反惆悵。」 「 愉 」也表示溫和，《字彙·心部》：「愉，顏色和悅貌。」文獻亦多用此義，如《禮記·祭義》：「其進之也，敬以愉。」鄭玄注：「愉，顏色和貌也。」又如《淮南子·本經》：「其心愉而不偽。」高誘注：「愉，和也。」 「 愉 」還表示悅服，即心悅誠服。《爾雅·釋詁上》：「愉，服也。」郭璞注：「謂喜而服從。」 「 愉 」在古代文獻中還可通為「 俞 」、「 諭 」、「 歈 」、「 偷 」等字，概與形似相關。
From the sound of " heart" and " Yu", the original meaning is happiness and joy. Jin Wen once wrote " Yu" and " heart", meaning " steal". "Shuowen": "Bo Ye. From the heart, Yu Sheng. The Analects of Confucius said: Private confession, pleasure and joy like also." Duan Yucai's note: "This Bo is also regarded as Bo Le Ye, transcribed with the word Duo Le. Superficial pleasure." Pre-Qin documents use the original meaning, such as "Lu Shi Chunqiu·Forbidden Fortress": "The karma of the Three Emperors and Five Emperors is called the karma of the three emperors and five emperors, and it is for pleasure." Du Fu (Xiwanzhou): "Ji Li is temporarily happy, but the old man is melancholy." " Yu" also means gentleness. "Zihui·Heart": "Yes, color and pleasing appearance." Documents also use this meaning, such as "Book of Rites·Sacrificial Righteousness": "If it enters, respect it with pleasure." Zheng Xuan noted : "Disappearance, color and appearance." Another example is "Huainanzi · Benjing": "Its heart is pleasant and not fake." Gao You's note: "Discovery, harmony." " Pleasure" also means to persuade, that is, to persuade the heart. "Erya·Study on the Interpretation": "Pleasure and service." Guo Pu's note: "Be happy and obey." " Discovery" in ancient texts can also pass as " Yu", " encyclical", " Yu", " steal" words, almost associated with the shape.

Name meaning
: Harmony, the meaning of pleasure.
yú, tōu, yù
I гл.
1) yú наслаждаться (чем-л.), находить удовольствие в (чем-л.)
他人是愉 другие будут наслаждаться ею (твоей упряжкой, после твоей смерти)
2) yú радоваться, веселиться
为之(wèizhī)出死断亡而愉者 ради него народ работает из последних сил и, даже идя на верную гибель, радуется этому
3) tōu проявлять небрежность, действовать кое-как, поступать, не задумываясь о дальнейшем
以俗教安则民不愉 воспитание согласно обычаев приносит спокойствие, и в этом случае народ не станет действовать небрежно
II прил.
yú мягкий, дружественный, благожелательный
其心愉而不伪 его сердце мягко и не фальшиво
III сущ.
1) yú песня
吴愉越吟 Песни царства У и стихи царства Юэ
2) yù усталость, утомление
Radicals: 忄  (soul, death-star)
Meaning Mnemonic
The soul of the Death Star is actually quite pleasant. And if you think about it, it's the people who control the Death Star that are evil and kill.
Picture the Death Star in your mind. As you picture it, its pleasant, smiling soul floats up and out of it. "Oh hello, dear," it says happily, "Didn't see you there!"
Reading Mnemonic
The pleasant soul within the Death Star actually looks like a yurt (ゆ), not a big angry, metal ball.
Yurts are very pleasant structures. They're round and soft and moveable, just like the Death Star's soul.
